channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: s1: Simple test-time scaling
item.description: After supervised finetuning the Qwen2. 5-32B-Instruct language model on s1K and equipping it with budget forcing, our model s1-32B exceeds o1-preview on competition math questions by up to 27% (MATH and AIME24).

item.title: DeepSeek-VL2: Mixture-of-Experts Vision-Language Models for Advanced Multimodal Understanding
item.description: We present DeepSeek-VL2, an advanced series of large Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) Vision-Language Models that significantly improves upon its predecessor, DeepSeek-VL, through two key major upgrades.

item.title: Flaming-hot Initiation with Regular Execution Sampling for Large Language Models
item.description: Since the release of ChatGPT, large language models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable capabilities across various domains.

item.title: Align Anything: Training All-Modality Models to Follow Instructions with Language Feedback
item.description: In this work, we make the first attempt to fine-tune all-modality models (i. e. input and output with any modality, also named any-to-any models) using human preference data across all modalities (including text, image, audio, and video), ensuring its behavior aligns with human intentions.

item.title: ASAP: Aligning Simulation and Real-World Physics for Learning Agile Humanoid Whole-Body Skills
item.description: In the second stage, we deploy the policies in the real world and collect real-world data to train a delta (residual) action model that compensates for the dynamics mismatch.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via Reinforcement Learning
item.description: We introduce our first-generation reasoning models, DeepSeek-R1-Zero and DeepSeek-R1.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3 Technical Report
item.description: We present DeepSeek-V3, a strong Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) language model with 671B total parameters with 37B activated for each token.

item.title: Data Formulator 2: Iteratively Creating Rich Visualizations with AI
item.description: To create rich visualizations, data analysts often need to iterate back and forth among data processing and chart specification to achieve their goals.

item.title: RAG Foundry: A Framework for Enhancing LLMs for Retrieval Augmented Generation
item.description: We introduce RAG Foundry, an open-source framework for augmenting large language models for RAG use cases.

item.title: DeepSeek-Coder: When the Large Language Model Meets Programming -- The Rise of Code Intelligence
item.description: The rapid development of large language models has revolutionized code intelligence in software development.

item.title: One-Prompt-One-Story: Free-Lunch Consistent Text-to-Image Generation Using a Single Prompt
item.description: Drawing inspiration from the inherent context consistency, we propose a novel training-free method for consistent text-to-image (T2I) generation, termed "One-Prompt-One-Story" (1Prompt1Story).

item.title: Assisting in Writing Wikipedia-like Articles From Scratch with Large Language Models
item.description: We study how to apply large language models to write grounded and organized long-form articles from scratch, with comparable breadth and depth to Wikipedia pages.

item.title: SGLang: Efficient Execution of Structured Language Model Programs
item.description: SGLang consists of a frontend language and a runtime.

item.title: Janus-Pro: Unified Multimodal Understanding and Generation with Data and Model Scaling
item.description: In this work, we introduce Janus-Pro, an advanced version of the previous work Janus.

item.title: Cut Your Losses in Large-Vocabulary Language Models
item.description: We implement a custom kernel that performs the matrix multiplications and the log-sum-exp reduction over the vocabulary in flash memory, making global memory consumption for the cross-entropy computation negligible.

item.title: DeepSeek-Coder-V2: Breaking the Barrier of Closed-Source Models in Code Intelligence
item.description: Through this continued pre-training, DeepSeek-Coder-V2 substantially enhances the coding and mathematical reasoning capabilities of DeepSeek-V2, while maintaining comparable performance in general language tasks.

item.title: UI-TARS: Pioneering Automated GUI Interaction with Native Agents
item.description: This paper introduces UI-TARS, a native GUI agent model that solely perceives the screenshots as input and performs human-like interactions (e. g., keyboard and mouse operations).

item.title: One Diffusion Step to Real-World Super-Resolution via Flow Trajectory Distillation
item.description: We use the state-of-the-art diffusion model FLUX. 1-dev as both the teacher model and the base model.

item.title: IntellAgent: A Multi-Agent Framework for Evaluating Conversational AI Systems
item.description: IntellAgent represents a paradigm shift in evaluating conversational AI.

item.title: DeepSeek LLM: Scaling Open-Source Language Models with Longtermism
item.description: The rapid development of open-source large language models (LLMs) has been truly remarkable.
